Name: Witty witch
About the game: Witty witch is a 2D puzzle platformer with handpainted graphics. Suitable for a wide audience of all ages and preferences. 100 levels, filled with a variety of monsters will force you to show ingenuity and dexterity. And a funny story will give motivation to reach the end.
